A pH neutralized mixture of organic acids The measured pH of 100% Tacsimate is 7.0 at 25 degrees Celsius The composition of 100% Tacsimate is 1.36 M Malonic acid, 0.25 M tri-Ammonium citrate, 0.12 M Succinic acid, 0.3 M dl-Malic acid, 0.4 M Sodium acetate, 0.5 M Sodium formate, and 0.16 M di-Ammonium tartrate.
